Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.name: Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic
Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.description: Aberrant whispers shield one target's mind or your own, granting a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Accept Echo.name: Effect: Accept Echo
Effect: Accept Echo.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.

At 7th level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13th level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15th level you become legendary with the skill you chose.

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: Effect: Accursed Clay Fist
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Effect: Aldori Parry.name: Effect: Aldori Parry
Effect: Aldori Parry.description:
Requirements You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).name: Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic)
Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Evil).name: Effect: Align Armament (Evil)
Effect: Align Armament (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Good).name: Effect: Align Armament (Good)
Effect: Align Armament (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).name: Effect: Align Armament (Lawful)
Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Angelic Blood Magic
Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.description: An angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Ashes Curse.name: Effect: Ashes Curse
Effect: Ashes Curse.description: Note: neither the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} conditions are applied automatically in the moderate curse.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Effect: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Augment Senses.name: Effect: Augment Senses
Effect: Augment Senses.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.

Effect: Aura of Despair.name: Effect: Aura of Despair
Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Aura of Faith.name: Effect: Aura of Faith
Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Each good-aligned ally within 15 feet deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.

Effect: Aura of Life.name: Effect: Aura of Life
Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: Effect: Aura of Righteousness
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.gKDRnsBPBdhJB0FI]{Avenge in Glory}

Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

Effect: Battle Curse.name: Effect: Battle Curse
Effect: Battle Curse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Note: The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} condition is not applied for the major curse

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person for the duration.

Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: Effect: Bespell Weapon
Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 mental damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 negative damage.

Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.description:
An anarchic rune is jagged and asymmetrical, channeling chaotic energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage against lawful targets. If you are lawful, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at a Strike with this weapon against a lawful creature, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, you deal double minimum damage; on a 3 or 4, double your damage normally; on a 5 or 6, you deal double maximum damage.

Craft Requirements You are chaotic.

Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.description:
Complex and symmetrical, an axiomatic rune imbues a weapon with lawful energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage against chaotic targets. If you are chaotic, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll with this weapon against a chaotic creature, instead of rolling, count each weapon damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, 7 for d12).

Craft Requirements You are lawful.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.description: A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Greater)
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.description:
A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {2d6}[positive]]]{2d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] with the following effects. This is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Success It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure It's destroyed.

Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.description: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}

Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.description: This weapon is empowered by flickering flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} on a successful Strike, plus [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.description: The weapon can harm creatures without physical form. A ghost touch weapon is particularly effective against incorporeal creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to ghost touch weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield ghost touch weapons (unlike most physical objects).

Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.description:
Holy weapons command powerful celestial energy. A weapon with this rune deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[good]]]{1d6 good damage} against evil targets. If you are evil, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon

Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.

Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.description: The edges of a keen weapon are preternaturally sharp. Attacks with this weapon are a critical hit on a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This property has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.description:
An unholy rune instills fiendish power into the etched weapon. A weapon with this rune deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[evil]]]{1d6 evil damage} when it hits a good target. If you are good, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against a good creature with the weapon

Effect The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success] per weapon damage die of the etched weapon.

Effect: Blizzard Evasion.name: Effect: Blizzard Evasion
Effect: Blizzard Evasion.description: You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: Effect: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and takes a -2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success)
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and takes a -3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Bone Swarm.name: Effect: Bone Swarm
Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6 bludgeoning damage} to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: Effect: Brightness Seeker
Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

Effect: Bristle.name: Effect: Bristle
Effect: Bristle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Calculate Threats.name: Effect: Calculate Threats
Effect: Calculate Threats.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Fha8jFmfkOPxAsrZ]{Calculate Threats}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Cat Nap.name: Effect: Cat Nap
Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: Effect: Catfolk Dance
Effect: Catfolk Dance.description: The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Celestial Wings.name: Effect: Celestial Wings
Effect: Celestial Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Celestial Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: Effect: Ceremony of Protection
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Clue In.name: Effect: Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In}

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness, Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Expertise).name: Effect: Clue In (Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Expertise).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: Effect: Current Spell (Air)
Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.

Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: Effect: Current Spell (Water)
Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut From The Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Daydream Trance.name: Effect: Daydream Trance
Effect: Daydream Trance.description: You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3 .

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike
Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Success)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).description: The corruption of sin makes you more imposing. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).description: Hellfire fills your tongue with lies. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Effect: Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Force)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 force damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description: Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: Effect: Educate Allies (Self)
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Granted by using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Effect: Elemental Assault
Effect: Elemental Assault.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description: Elemental energy surrounds you. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}.

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

Effect: Emotional Surge.name: Effect: Emotional Surge
Effect: Emotional Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]{Emotional Surge}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Effect: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Effect: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Effect: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Fey Blood Magic.name: Effect: Fey Blood Magic
Effect: Fey Blood Magic.description: Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Effect: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Effect: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]{Formation Training}

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Effect: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Effect: Great Tengu Form
Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell level and must attempt a basic Will save.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

If you also know the ki blast ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry} edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit} edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision} edge with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

Effect: Hybrid Form.name: Effect: Hybrid Form
Effect: Hybrid Form.description: In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Effect: Hydration.name: Effect: Hydration
Effect: Hydration.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration} if you spend 24 hours outside of water.

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description: A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations
Effect: Methodical Debilitations.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Necrotic Infusion.name: Effect: Necrotic Infusion
Effect: Necrotic Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H]{Necrotic Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Panache.name: Effect: Panache
Effect: Panache.description:
You care as much about the way you accomplish something as whether you actually accomplish it in the first place. When you perform an action with particular bravado, you can leverage this moment of verve to perform spectacular, deadly maneuvers. This state of flair is called panache, and you are either in a state of panache or you are not.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 positive damage.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Effect: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description: The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.

Effect: Radiant Infusion.name: Effect: Radiant Infusion
Effect: Radiant Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Radiant Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.

Effect: Rage.name: Effect: Rage
Effect: Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire} damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold} damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead}.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description:
This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Note: The effect lasts until the end of your turn, and should be manually removed after you have made a skill check.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception)
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Shed Tail.name: Effect: Shed Tail
Effect: Shed Tail.description: You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Effect: Shield Ally
Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Smite Evil.name: Effect: Smite Evil
Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 good damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 evil damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Effect: Soaring Flight
Effect: Soaring Flight.description: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Effect: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Effect: Spiral Sworn
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description: You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Effect: Tidal Shield
Effect: Tidal Shield.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Effect: Undying Conviction
Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}
